cs.ualberta.ca.tunein.network

Interface ElasticSearchOperationsInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElasticSearchOperations

    public interface ElasticSearchOperationsInterface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getCommentPosts(String parentID, Comment model, Context cntxt)
      Searches the server for Comments
      void getProfileModel(String id, Commenter model, Context cntxt)
      Gets the profile from the server.
      void getRepliesByParentId(String parentID, Comment model, Context cntxt, ReplyViewAdapter adap)
      Searches the server for Comment replies corresponding to parent id.
      void getReplyReplies(Comment model, String parentID, Context cntxt) 
      void getTopicsBySort(ThreadList modelList, Context cntxt, String sort)
      Method to get comments from elasticsearch and sort them based on the specified sort option in the parameters, either: hotness(default), date, picture, my location, set location Code from: http://www.elasticsearch.org/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-request-sort.html
      void postCommentModel(Comment model)
      Sends a Comment to the server.
      void postProfileModel(Commenter model)
      Sends a commenter profile to the server.
      void putCommentModel(Comment model)
      Method used for updating a comment on elasticsearch by posting using the elastic id.
      void putProfileModel(Commenter model)
      Updates a profile to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getCommentPosts

        void getCommentPosts(String parentID,
                   Comment model,
                   Context cntxt)
        Searches the server for Comments
        Parameters:
        model - the ThreadLis to clear and then fill with the new data
        activity - a TopicListActivity

      • getProfileModel

        void getProfileModel(String id,
                   Commenter model,
                   Context cntxt)
        Gets the profile from the server.
        Parameters:
        id - The elastic id to search for profile.
        model - The profile that user will be loaded into.
        cntxt - Context of application.

      • getRepliesByParentId

        void getRepliesByParentId(String parentID,
                        Comment model,
                        Context cntxt,
                        ReplyViewAdapter adap)
        Searches the server for Comment replies corresponding to parent id.
        Parameters:
        model - the ThreadLis to clear and then fill with the new data
        activity - a TopicListActivity

      • getReplyReplies

        void getReplyReplies(Comment model,
                   String parentID,
                   Context cntxt)

      • getTopicsBySort

        void getTopicsBySort(ThreadList modelList,
                   Context cntxt,
                   String sort)
        Method to get comments from elasticsearch and sort them based on the specified sort option in the parameters, either: hotness(default), date, picture, my location, set location Code from: http://www.elasticsearch.org/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search-request-sort.html
        Parameters:
        modelList - ThreadList that will be filled.
        activity - Activity that calls this method.

      • postCommentModel

        void postCommentModel(Comment model)
        Sends a Comment to the server. Does nothing if the request fails.
        Parameters:
        model - a Comment

      • postProfileModel

        void postProfileModel(Commenter model)
        Sends a commenter profile to the server.
        Parameters:
        model - The profile to be sent.

      • putCommentModel

        void putCommentModel(Comment model)
        Method used for updating a comment on elasticsearch by posting using the elastic id.
        Parameters:
        model - comment to be posted

      • putProfileModel

        void putProfileModel(Commenter model)
        Updates a profile to the server.
        Parameters:
        model - The profile to be sent.
